use.flag: Build the Qt-GTK+ style, which integrates Qt4 apps with the GTK+ theme.
Enable support for hildon's inputmethod. You'll need this if you're planning to run chrooted Qt apps on the N900.
Enable the Qt3Support libraries for Qt4. Note that this does not mean you can compile pure Qt3 programs with Qt4.
Use the stable git branch - it is slightly behind master but guaranteed by Nokia to compile
